title: Great staff and Community !
posting_body: ['Welcome to Sevilla Condos!', 'Sevilla Condos is surrounded by mature oak trees that whisk you away from the noise of a busy day while still being conveniently located minutes from Carrolltons Historic Downtown.', 'These apartments were made with you in mind!', 'Make your appointment today and come see your new home!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Refrigerator', '-Vaulted Ceilings', '-Air Conditioning', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Pantry', '-Business Center', '-Extra Storage', '-Close to Freeway', '-Close to Schools', '-Spanish Speaking Staff', '-Near Public Transportation', '-Disposal', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
